feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:07 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 03:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: E 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then flurries or periods of rain. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries or periods of rain changing to periods of rain or drizzle near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries changing to snow at times heavy near midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. High zero. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 6. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
